Class SlidePolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Polygon
          • graphicshandler.SlidePolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class SlidePolygon
extends javafx.scene.shape.Polygon
    SmartTrolley Generates a Polygon suitable to pass all the tests determined by the PWS and contract with Spoon
    Version:
    [v1.0] [Date Created: 25/04/14]
    Author:
    Matthew Wells, Alasdair Munday, [Checked By:] [Checker(s) fill here]
